00026 #ifndef HTTPMESSAGE_H
00027 #define HTTPMESSAGE_H
00028 
00029 #include "httpversion.h"
00030 #include <QHash>
00031 #include <QIODevice>
00032 
00033 class HttpMessage
00034 {
00035 public:
00036     HttpMessage(HttpVersion httpVersion);
00037     ~HttpMessage();
00038 
00039     HttpVersion httpVersion() const;
00040     void setHttpVersion(const HttpVersion &version);
00041 
00042     QByteArray header(const QByteArray &name) const;
00043     /*
00044       if value is null, the header is removed (if exists)
00045       */
00046     void setHeader(const QByteArray &name, const QByteArray &value);
00047     QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray> headers() const;
00048     QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray>::const_iterator headersBeginIterator() const;
00049     QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray>::const_iterator headersEndIterator() const;
00050 
00051     qint64 entitySize() const;
00052     QByteArray entityBody() const;
00053     /*
00054       returns the number of bytes written or -1 if some error occurs
00055       */
00056     qint64 entityBody(QIODevice *device) const;
00057     void setEntityBody(const QByteArray &body);
00058     /*
00059       the \p bodyDevice must be opened in readMode and must be
00060       random-acess (not sequencial) device
00061 
00062       takes ownership of bodyDevice if successful
00063       */
00064     bool setEntityBody(QIODevice *bodyDevice);
00065 
00066 private:
00067     HttpVersion m_httpVersion;
00068 
00069     // the maximum number of headers should be 64
00070     QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray> m_headers;
00071 
00072     QByteArray m_entityBody;
00073     // TODO: use QSharedPointer
00074     QIODevice *m_entityBodyDevice;
00075 };
00076 
00077 inline HttpVersion HttpMessage::httpVersion() const
00078 {
00079     return m_httpVersion;
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline QByteArray HttpMessage::header(const QByteArray &name) const
00083 {
00084     return m_headers.value(name);
00085 }
00086 
00087 inline QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray> HttpMessage::headers() const
00088 {
00089     return m_headers;
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray>::const_iterator HttpMessage::headersBeginIterator() const
00093 {
00094     return m_headers.begin();
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline QHash<QByteArray, QByteArray>::const_iterator HttpMessage::headersEndIterator() const
00098 {
00099     return m_headers.end();
00100 }
00101 
00102 inline qint64 HttpMessage::entitySize() const
00103 {
00104     if (m_entityBodyDevice) {
00105         return m_entityBodyDevice->size();
00106     } else {
00107         return m_entityBody.size();
00108     }
00109 }
00110 
00111 inline QByteArray HttpMessage::entityBody() const
00112 {
00113     if (m_entityBodyDevice)
00114         return m_entityBodyDevice->readAll();
00115     else
00116         return m_entityBody;
00117 }

00119 #endif // HTTPMESSAGE_H
